column5: Send Dave a PM so he does get it rather then hope he reads this again.  just saying...

Hi Fellow Hobbyists... My name is Dave I was referred by GBW ( who has a family cottage on the same lake as me ). Geoff and I TRY and get out on Four Mile Lake( Burnt River/Bobcaygeon area ) as much as we can. My HOME is in Hastings, as RICE is the 5 minute EASY FIX when I get the shakes..  Have been out 5 X already this early season and have been meeting with Avg. sucess. Gearing up for MUSKIE Hunting and already have ordered some COWGIRLS from Mike P. ( Thanks Mike loving the Purple flashed ULTRAlite BTW.. ) and a LOVE getting out Rain or SHine. Thanks for all the Update posts RE: conditions and choices of tackle et all. Hope to have some stories and pics too.  Peace Out Dave
glad to see you posting Dave. Were you there yesterday?  I didn't see anyone when I went by in the boat. I'm going back this Sunday if you want to hunt some big fish?
welcome aboard
Welcome aboard, Dave.

Friend of Geoffs eh ?......Well, welcome to the board anyways........  JK !!! You will love it here. Glad you joined and looking forward to seeing your reports. Any friend of Geoffs, is a friend of mine.  Paul
Welcome to the board! Lots o' info here!
welcome aboard  but   Don't rock the boat    that's my job
Welcome Dave...........hello to you too
Cool, I'll be there Sunday before lunch and I'll give you a shout then.  Not to worry about the trees as my dad's working on that all week now.
welcome aboard!.. alot of great people here in this community.... welcome
Welcome Dave!
speak for yourself  Hey Dave ever heard the term ...."guilty by association?"...no worries we wont hold the "company you keep" against you  welcome aboard
Welcome to the board Dave
Welcome to the board, Dave!  Enjoy, there is plenty of knowledge that is shared by many. Not too mention a great classified area that can be hard on the wallet at times
Welcome Dave, I think you'll enjoy it here...  Maureen
hey now
And next year he'll invite you to the Brooklin Spring Fair.  Welcome
Dave was invited to the fair
I'll give you a warm welcome Dave, but you might have been better off not metioning Geoff....just saying....
It should be mandatory for all OFNers  Call it the Brooklin Spring Meat (fair food) And Greet.

hey now, lol.  PS, where have the emails been...  I'm all for that!!!  Heck, I would have a big BBQ for dinner after the fair as long as people brought stuff and drinks.     I'm not about to feed and water all of OFC in the area...
Welcome aboard! Im a fellow noob as well
Welcome Dave
just happen to have a cottage rented in hastings for canada weekend.just wondering what the fishing is like in those parts.       any info would be appreciated...
